channel.title: Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Client Side Search Engine for Hugo Website
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to setup client side search engine for Hugo Website without any backend server or additional build steps required.

item.title: Add Social Icons in Hugo Website Pages
item.description: If you are using Hugo as a static site generator tool then you can create a partial to show social icons like facebook, twitter, linkedin, whatsapp etc to share page links on social media.

item.title: Customize sitemap in Hugo Website
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to disable or customize sitemap.xml for Hugo website.

item.title: Useful Hugo Shortcodes
item.description: If you are using Hugo as a static site generator tool then you might have used hugo built-in shortcodes but here are some amazing hugo shortcodes which can be used in markdown files of your hugo website.

item.title: Add Structure Data JSON-LD in Hugo Website Pages
item.description: When you add structure data to your website, it helps google, bing or other website indexers to understand the content for your website and pages which leads to better search results for your website and eventually helps in SEO ranking.
